labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Depending on mode, the game gets stuck in shift-mode or is unresponsive at all. No button will work before tabbing out. This might include Esc, all Abilities or "ping only".
data.short_description: Overlay in League of Legends causes unresponsiveness ingame
data.steps_to_repro: - play League in any mode (Windowed, Fullscreen, Borderless) - have Discord Overlay enabled - (preferably use the regular keybindings) - press and hold Shift, Alt, A or Rightclick (or other keys used in the game) - (additionally any ability key will work if said ability is a chargeable one) - on top of that, access the overlay via your overlay shortcut - (right)click back into the game and try to continue playing normally
